issue.title: Name of locale formed from two named locales by locale::combine()

blockquote.p: A locale constructed from a name string (such as "POSIX"), or from parts of two named locales, has a name; all others do not.

blockquote.pre: template<class Facet> locale combine(const locale& other) const;

blockquote.p: Remarks: The resulting locale has no name.

discussion.p: It seems the combine() interface does not match the general design description.
